content: I have a lot of wait time in my work, I play a LOT of Solitaire. An advertisement free experience is my first priority, sensible layout and responsive card play is next. I have tried and uninstalled several other Solitaire packs. I will keep this one. Thanks Stellar, good job. Poo
There are alot of games to choose from, solitaire without all the gimmicks. Perfect for those who just want to play cards. Highly recommend.
replyContent:
No Problem, Leslie!   I left a backdoor for anyone to keep the "clean look"
    - In General Options  set  Hint Delay  to  2021
    - exit General Options, then go right back and set "Hint Delay" to "3333"
    - Old style card placeholders will be restored
  (Repeat on each device using Stellar Solitaire or on a reinstall)

content: Best solitaire game pack available. Solid, never crashes and can be played off-line. Numerous, fun games with excellent demos. I've used it for years and it's always a go-to for me.

I have used and enjoyed playing this app for years. When the most recent update occurred, I found the cards nearly impossible to read. Apparently, the update returned some of the options to their default settings. The developer was very quick to respond to my concern, reminding me that the slider bar in the settings option labeled "rank and suit" adjusts the readability of the cards. Fun app to use...great responsiveness of the developer.
replyContent: Thanks for updating the review, Susan.  If you (or any user) have issues or questions, just send an email to stellarsolitaire@gmail.com and we will get back to you as quickly as possible.

content: I paid for it and there aren't ads. I can play off-line now.

This app has been a solid five stars for well over 8 (?) years since I first installed it. I'm dropping a star now as it needs to be updated to work with Android OS 10. Ever since the recent OS update, It's starting to crash...a lot (never did before). Fortunately, it doesn't lose the stats. It still remains a solid, all-around value.
replyContent: V3.02 of Stellar Solitaire, released on Sept 1, 2020, is updated for recent Androids through Android 10. This first update in 5 years incorporates many fixes and improvements (as well as 11 new solitaires). You will find it quite stable.

content: I have been enjoying this app for over 6 years now and thoroughly recommend it to everyone ; very reliable and quiet trouble free. Top app.
I love this app. It has a great selection of games, good options and it doesn't demand to raid your phone for info! Or bombard you with ads! they need to make it for ios.
great game worth the money thanks

This has been my favorite solitaire game for years. With smartphones having more capabilities, RAM, power, I have looked at others and still come back to this one. My only wish is that there were updates. Not a lot, just so future phone and Android OS upgrades won't have me scrambling for a substitute.
replyContent: Your wish is granted.  V3.0.2 released on Sept 1, 2020 is a major upgrade with Android 10 compatibility

content: lots of fun! tons of games to choose from
Reliable.  Game play is not interrupted by ads. Good variety of games. Excellent customization if the rules you like are not the default rules. Remembers my choices and never resets them.

It would be a nice addition to have a favorites catagory so that a person can have a group of games they prefer available to play instead of having to go through the whole list each time they want to play a different game.
Great game

I loved this solitaire app. So amy games and the demos very helpful. But tonight I had to uninstall because the last game totally froze at the end. As in froze the whole app. Couldn't change games. Went out of the app and back several times, but it would always take me right back to the end of that same game. Tried restarting my tablet. Didn't work.

Have to say that l really think this collection is up there with the best of the best !!! The demo sequences take these card games to the next level making each and every game a joy to learn . The only thing l would change is a way to high light my favourite games , perhaps grouped together under a branch of the different games ? Having said that l wholeheartedly recommend to everyone!!!
Good games, lots of options. Love that there are no ads & can play in airplane mode!

Thank you for the wonderful collection.   Request: I've played a game called Spiderette (sp?) that I love when no time for the full version. I believe it's just one deck and has fewer (7 or 8) columns but otherwise plays the same as Spider. Any chance of adding it? I would thank you. My hemorrhoids would thank you (okay, I play it mostly in the bathroom!).
replyContent: if you send an email to "stellarsolitaire@gmail.com", I'd be glad to discuss Spiderette.

content: Every solitaire game you can think of and so many more! I love learning new games and going back to old favorites.

I love this Solitaire app, it has a generous variety of games, and customizable features.  Once I found this, I uninstalled other individual game apps. Nice to be able choose among games of different length and difficulty.  Try it!

Love it! So many games with excellent demos and written instructions.  Because there are so many games, I would LOVE TO SEE THE ABILITY TO SAVE MY FAVORITE GAMES, as I often can't remember the names of new games I've tried and liked.  Great app!

I've always enjoyed solitaire card games, and to have so many available at such a reasonable price is great for us enthusiasts.  There are quite a few games here that I'm unfamiliar with, so to have the demos as well as written instructions and hints is going to be a great help.  I've only just bought the app and I've already got a favourite game - Crazy Quilt, as it reminds me of mahjong solitaire, which I also enjoy playing.
It's an addictive time waster. Gets me out of conversations, game playing with family, or reading. I just sit in the chair and play. Forget exercising.
Just rediscovered this game app. I love it. The bowling game is fun and enjoyable!

One thing I like about solitaire is I'm the only one playing and I'm not competing with anyone else. If I want to replay a game because I am developing a strategy, I should be able to play the same draw again. This was a waste of money and memory. I like to test my hypotheses. If i can only play a set of cards once, my ideas can't be tested.
replyContent: Melissa, you CAN replay a game.  From the game Menu, press "Replay", which will replay the entire game (at a speed you can select from "General Options"), During the replay, touch any card and it will stop at that point and you can play on from there.  { The Stellar start-up screen continuously shows 29 very useful tips, and this is one of them! }

content: LOTS of game variations, beautiful layout, teaching/demo modes & more make this one of the best standalone soltaire apps of all time!
I need to take back what I said before. Yes, I still believe it could be more attractive, but it quickly also because my go-to game app and I absolutely love it.
Can't imagine paying for something that does have ads.
replyContent: You must have the wrong app.  Stellar solitaire has absolutely NO ads and NO pernissions!

content: Good games. I do not like the timer though. An option to turn it off would be great
Best card game app ever. Simple to use and no invasive permissions.

Love Virginia Reel, but some of my cards won't move. For instance, if I need a 7♤  on the 4♤ in the foundation basecard 4 row, the 7♤ will enlarge but not move. Tap tap tap - but no move. This happens frequently. (I am not trying to move cards to the very  bottom row of reserve cards.) I also sometimes want to move card from a foundation row (not the base card itself or from a pile on a basecard) before the same number/face card in the reserve row. Your game will only let me move the same number from the re
replyContent:
Hi Joanne :
Double-tap only expands a column so cards can be easily seen/ touched (not moved).  Just tap once OR drag & drop.  Your text got cut off, so I don't understand 2nd issue - important to realize you can't move card from foundation row unless a base card for that row can immediately replace it. Please email us at stellarsolitaire@gmail.com

content: Absolutely love this game!  So many choices, great demos.  Just wish it would mark the games you have played and especially the ones you have won.

Absolutely love this game. Appropriate permissions, lots of variety and customization. Devs were super speedy to reply to my request and notified me when it became reality. My charging cable and I thank you for rotating landscape. :-)
replyContent: Trina, the landscape rotation issue is fixed on Version 2.7.1 released on March 5, 2015

content: Every solitaire game I want in one app, worth the price.
AWESOME!!!!!!
So many games and different player options...well worth the price!
I've had this game for years and still love it.
Stellar solitaite

Absolutely worth $1.99, I despise advertising interruptions when playing games & this completely solves this problem. The list of card games is tremendous. Quality options to personalize. Old Favorites & New Challenges, Love This App.
Well worth the small price and they require no access

Demo mode is great.  Lots of variety.  Only complaint is that Terrace constantly restarts before I finish the game!  Could be the game, could be me!  Thanks so much for the solution!!!  Great to know I'm not going nuts!!
replyContent: Terrace problem is fixed in Version 2.6.2, released Nov 21, 2014

content: How can one get a better friend. Perfect for me. Thank you.

This is a wonderful collection of games. My only problem is that I would like to actually replay the games instead of seeing how I played it. .  .  .Since you solved my problem,  I have to give you 5 stars. Thank you.
replyContent: You can! Touch any card on screen at any time during replay, then play on from that point. If game is already over, your new replay won't count against statistics and it won't automatically detect game over (since it already considers it over for statistics purposes). (OR uncheck "Detect Lost Games" and losses won't count until you do "Next Game")

content: Great job WHELAN Software !
Great collection of games done very well. Demo mode is fantastic.
Excellent! Really love this
Excellent solitaire app, it has all the games I know, and it teaches me the games that I don't!
This is the best multi-game Solitaire game I have ever found! Get it!
Love the variety and ability to customize. BUT one of the games, Canfield, restarts to a new game right in the middle of playing. VERY bothersome!! Please fix it!
replyContent: The problem with Canfield is fixed on Version 2.3.1 released Oct 4, 2013.

content: This app gets the job done, had lots of fun game and works great. UI is quite ugly & not modern, will 5 star once UI is cleaned up and PLEASE make the back button go BACK not close the effing app. So annoying
replyContent:
"Back" button usage :
In game, brings up Game Menu.
In Game Menu, goes to Main Menu.
In Main Menu, exits app.
Intentionally works as above so successive touch of "Back" always gets out of app.
However, while doing "Watch Demo", a defect allowed "Back" to exit. This is fixed
as of Version 2.3.1, Oct 4, 2013.

content: This is a nice package. I've been waiting for a solitaire app with a good selection of games and a minimal interface, and this hits the spot. A few suggestions: 1) Get rid of the gradient header and gradient/rounded menu buttons, make them solid/rectangle. Gradients and rounded buttons are pretty much outdated nowadays. 2) Back button should maybe confirm before exiting a game, or the main menu should have a "resume last game" option. It's annoying if I accidentally press back in a game, and I have to re-se
I bought it to play crazy quilt.  Can't put it's down.
Crappy klondike
replyContent: Stellar's Klondike is full-featured, with options that allow you to play any variation you desire, with realistic play, elegant card movement, one-touch moves, end-of-game detection, and a tutorial demo game. Could you be more specific about its perceived shortcomings?  Also, Version 1.10 is way out of date, try upgrading to most recent version.

content: I've had to uninstall and install this game 5 times now! I love crazy quilts, but it just freezes up in the middle of a game. Fix it please!
Would be great if it didn't freeze up a lot at the end of the game on my Samsung galaxy lll.
replyContent: Stellar is changed as of Version 2.2 to detect and recover from certain potential freeze conditions.

content: Does what it says on the tin.
This is a beautiful game!  Great variety of solitaires.  My kids enjoy it too.

I grew up playing many variations of solitaire. We wanted a version for the Droid with a selection of games.  My son and I really liked that we can try and beat each others score. My favorite is Klondike.  Very smooth-playing version!  The only problem is that my son is constantly taking my phone to play this game.  Five star rating from us.
Wont refund. Says my phone screen is too small.
Best collection of solitaire games I've seen, and I appreciate the instructions to learn new games. Looks and plays great on Transformer Prime Tablet.
I love this        real cards... Not silly home made fake looking
5 star solitaire game.
Good game
Wow, sleek, classy cards.  Variety of games that range from easy to expert.  Looks awesome on my tablet!  My kids love the multiplayer.
